amendment.description: To set aside an amount for a pilot project to test interoperable communications between the first Northern Border Air Wing, Bellingham, Washington, and local law enforcement personnel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3621 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3621 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S9117; text: CR S9117) To set aside an amount for a pilot project to test interoperable communications between the first Northern Border Air Wing, Bellingham, Washington, and local law enforcement personnel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3621 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3621 proposed by Senator Murray.
